conbody.p: The Yesod typeclass has a number of overrideable methods that allow you to configure your application. Besides approot, they are all optional, and provide sensible defaults. By using built-in Yesod constructs like defaultLayout and getMessage, you'll get a consistent look-and-feel throughout your site, including pages automatically generated by Yesod such as error pages and authentication.
We haven't covered all the methods in the Yesod typeclass in this chapter. For a full listing of methods available, you should consult the Haddock documentation.
